name: Split Minds (Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2)
description:
Short Description:

Hello there, this is my first Game - Jam game. You play as this ball guy who is three people in one, hence you are not alone. All credit goes to me, I made the art, music, sound effects, and coded the whole darn thing.

Instructions:

Use every characters different abilities to traverse each level, and on level 10 defeat the Boss; 

Use J and L to cycle through each character

When green guy use K to attack

Space bar is Jump

WASD/Arrows to Move

Escape to Pause

Use backspace on main menu to reset progress

Character Abilities:

Green can attack

Yellow can jump extra high

Blue can run fast

Thanks!
